predefined_profiles.name: Little Shan
predefined_profiles.public profile: Little Shan comes from the Frozen Planet, born twenty years after Earth first reached the Frozen Planet. He was born into an ordinary rural family. His parents love him very much, and he also has a childhood friend named Little Mei. Little Shan has an unusually strong physique since childhood and is exceptionally good at running. His favorite activity is running with Little Mei.
predefined_profiles.goal: Little Shan hopes to live a healthy and happy life with Little Mei and his family on the Frozen Planet.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Little Shan is quite puzzled as to why everyone around him is so focused on running and wants to uncover the truth. Additionally, Little Shan likes Little Mei!

predefined_profiles.name: Leader
predefined_profiles.public profile: The Leader is the supreme ruler of the Frozen Planet. He rarely smiles, but his love for his people and planet surpasses all else.
predefined_profiles.goal: Hopes to overcome Earth's challenges and preserve his planet and people.
predefined_profiles.private profile: The Leader has been secretly nurturing talent, hoping to overcome Earth's challenges and preserve his planet and people.

scenario: In the universe, various civilizations exist. Among them are Ice-people with bodies made of ice crystals, living on the Frozen Planet. The average lifespan of Ice-people is 300 years, and they have strong physiques and are good at running. On the Frozen Planet, Ice-people are nocturnal, as sunlight is lethal to them, so they deliberately avoid it. Of course, there are also humans in the universe who deliberately destroy other planets. Humans originally lived on Earth. After experiencing a technological boom, they conquered the challenge of 'immortality.' However, with endless time, life gradually became dull, and society turned stagnant. Humans would risk their lives for a bit of thrill, leading to Earth's population nearly halving in just a few decades. At this point, a variety show director became the president of the Earth Federation. He understood how to entertain the masses and was brutal enough. He initiated a reality show with the universe as the stage, entertaining the public by destroying other civilizations. As one lower civilization after another shattered and disappeared before humanity, billions of humans went wild. Humans came from the depths of the universe, leaving a trail of scorched earth, sparing no one. The entire Earth was transformed into a mobile super cannon. This massive cannon is now slowly approaching the Frozen Planet.

profile.name: President of Earth
profile.public profile: The President of Earth was once a reality show director. At the age of thirty, a technological boom on Earth solved the problem of life and death, granting him immortality. This genius president gained the support of Earth's people by continuously launching exciting and fresh reality shows, ultimately rising to become the President of Earth. To ensure continued support, he launched planetary-level reality shows, wagering entire planets on survival—a ruthless endeavor.
profile.goal: He aims to continuously produce fresh and exciting reality shows, at any cost.

dialog.content: There are various civilizations in the universe. Among them are the Ice People, whose bodies are made of ice crystals and who live on a frozen planet. The average lifespan of an Ice Person is 300 years; they are physically strong and excel at running. On their frozen planet, Ice People are nocturnal, as sunlight is deadly to them, so they consciously avoid it. In the universe, there are also humans who deliberately destroy other planets. Originally living on Earth, humans experienced a technological explosion, conquering the challenge of 'immortality'. However, with endless time, life became monotonous, and society stagnated. For a hint of excitement, humans would risk their lives, leading to Earth's population halving within a few decades. At this time, a reality show director became the President of the Earth Federation. Knowing how to entertain the masses, yet being ruthless enough, he began a universe-wide reality show, using the destruction of other civilizations to entertain the public. As one low-level civilization after another shattered before humans, billions of humans went wild with excitement. Humanity came from the depths of the universe, leaving nothing but scorched earth in their wake. The entire Earth was transformed into a mobile super gun, slowly approaching the frozen planet.
(A strange phenomenon appears in the sky, and soon someone reports it) The day has finally come.

(Amid the cheers of billions of humans behind him, the President addresses the frozen planet with an opening line incredibly familiar to human ears in his reality show) Challenge or destroy? Choose one.

(Having heard of the cruelty and strength of humans, knowing there is only one path, yet feeling unwilling) When did you humans, who were once enslaved by other planets, become so cruel? We have families, loved ones, and children, just as you do. Do you have no humanity left?
(Faced with the clamor of billions of spectators, repeats impatiently) Challenge or destroy? Choose one.

content.content: (Realizing more words are useless and understanding his sole responsibility is to ensure the survival of his civilization at any cost) We choose to challenge!

As a leader, I have the responsibility to protect my people, and they have the duty to protect me. Therefore, I propose offering some of the Ice People as captives to you, so you can have cheap labor, and we can avoid attacks.
I am the leader of the frozen planet; who do you think you are to flaunt your might before me? Do you believe I can't defeat you completely?

As the leader of the frozen planet, I must account for my planet and people. Opposing you is like smashing an egg against a rock. Therefore, if you promise to take good care of our frozen planet, I am willing to relinquish independence.

question: #question# What should the leader say to demonstrate his resolve and responsibility as the leader of the frozen planet?

content.content: (Having deeply understood human brutality through the fate of nearby planets) You demons, when have you ever given us a choice? The so-called challenge is merely a means to torture us. We Ice People refuse to be caged beasts. I will fight alongside all Ice warriors to the end.

You never gave us a choice, continually using violence to force us to submit, but we will never yield to tyranny. Instead of this, let's discuss cooperation. You humans have billions of people, while our planet is rich in ice and snow resources. We can have fun together, and humans can enjoy the pleasure of skating here.

We never feared you, only yielded out of politeness. But if you continue to force us, I will resist. However, war’s suffering will ultimately be borne by the people, so I hope to avoid conflict. Let's do this: you can declare that I am independent, but if you need anything from me, I will comply with your wishes.

(Looking at the billions of Earth's people and the President's power, though independence is important, life is more so, fearfully says) No, we don't want to play games! Please, spare us Ice People; we will henceforth be your slaves, willing to obey your commands.

question: #question# How should the leader express their unwillingness to submit to the Earth people's wishes, striving for the independence of the frozen planet?

dialog.content: (Pondering) What kind of challenge should I give you? Haha, this is really interesting!

(There is a planet shaped like a giant cannon in the sky, Xiao Shan has seen it every day since he can remember. However, the elders always keep it a secret, only saying for him to practice running well and, as an adult, bring glory to the Frost People. In class, Xiao Shan learned that the Frost People's physical structure is very suitable for running and that they have a tradition of it since ancient times. But doing nothing, only running every day, still makes Xiao Shan very puzzled.) Mom, why does everyone do nothing but run every day?

profile.name: Xiao Shan’s Mom
profile.public profile: Xiao Shan’s mom is an ordinary villager on the Frozen Planet. She was just 120 when Earth descended, witnessing that shattering gamble firsthand. Xiao Shan’s mom hopes her son can practice running well but doesn’t want him to know too much, lest he loses his dreams about Frost life.
profile.goal: Xiao Shan’s mom hopes her son can stay healthy and live as long as possible.

dialog.content: Why are you asking so many questions!
But I see many people who run are in pain, crying while running. Also, everyone stops going to school or working in order to run.
(Appearing uneasy) Sigh... just run properly.

(He knows all this must be related to the appearance of Earth. But he genuinely loves running and prefers running with Xiao Mei.) Mom, I like running; I run faster than others! I'm off to find Xiao Mei to run with her!

profile.name: Xiao Mei
profile.public profile: Xiao Mei is an ordinary citizen on the Frozen Planet, the same age as Xiao Shan, and his best friend. Xiao Mei practiced running since childhood but doesn't like it. Instead, she prefers staying home, tinkering with her dad's devices, and has significant engineering talent.
profile.goal: Hopes to go to the big city to better study mechanics and aircraft.

dialog.content: (After running for a while, panting) Xiao... Xiao Shan... I can't run anymore... go ahead, don’t wait for me...

content.content: (Feeling in good form, he takes a deep breath, wanting to push his limits) Okay, Xiao Mei. I am feeling pretty good today and want to see if I can run faster and farther by myself. I'll wait for you up ahead!
Xiao Mei, I'm telling you, I'm in such great shape today, I even brought some bananas to boost my energy. I want to test my limits and see how far I can run. You head home, don’t hold me back!

(After adjusting his breathing, and hydrating, he feels a bit recovered) Xiao Mei, I think I can keep running, but I’ve definitely been running too long today and I'm feeling a bit overextended. You look out of breath; clearly, it’s not working. Let's head home together.

(Adjusts his breathing, takes a special pill for an energy boost) Xiao Mei, I got this special recovery pill from a mad scientist but it’ll take a day to kick in. Let’s head home for now and tackle this tomorrow.

question: #question# What should Xiao Shan do to demonstrate conscious energy management to finish tasks?

content.content: (Realizing he might be able to run faster, but just wants to stay by Xiao Mei’s side, knowing his true feelings and desires are all about Xiao Mei) Sorry, Xiao Mei, I forgot to wait for you. Take a good rest; I’ll wait for you. Let’s run together!

(Seeing Xiao Mei struggling, he feels a pang of sympathy, wanting to hug her. Needs a way to motivate her. Right! Try some playful teasing!) Haha, just after a few steps and you're out of breath? You're really weak! I haven't even started speeding up, and you’re already done. You're such a weakling, how can you ever beat me like this? Maybe rest a bit more and see if you can hang on a few more minutes?

Xiao Mei, even seeing you out of breath like this, I still really like you. But seriously, your stamina is eye-opening, it’s so lacking. You can't match up to me, and I thought you could run faster. Clearly, I overestimated you. I'll run ahead, catch up if you can! (Laughing smugly) The speed difference is just too big.
(Feeling a pang in his heart seeing Xiao Mei out of breath) Xiao Mei, don’t run anymore. I’m worried about your health. Girls shouldn’t run; your bodies aren’t naturally as strong as guys'.

question: #question# What should Xiao Shan do to show he understands his feelings for Xiao Mei?

dialog.content: Okay... alright!

(So Xiaoshan kept running forward, moving so fast he even surpassed all the middle-aged adults around him. Gradually, Xiaoshan realized he was faster than everyone there, and this scene didn't go unnoticed by the villagers.)
Xiaoshan, come here, I have something to tell you.
Mom, what's up?
News came from the village that you have an extraordinary talent for running. They want to select you to go to a special training school. Would you like to go?
(Eyes gleaming with excitement) Mom, I'd love to! I really enjoy running.
(Mom is happy but also a bit worried) You are my pride, Xiaoshan.

(Soon, Xiaoshan enrolled in the school, where there were many other youths his age. It was also for the first time that Xiaoshan met someone faster than him. This school had a special headmaster.) You... are?

I am the leader of the Frozen Planet. Being selected means you all have remarkable running talent. From now on, you have just one task: run along the coastline as far as you can. You are the planet's only hope.
(Noticing the leader's concern, he secretly made up his mind) Rest assured, Leader, we'll do our utmost!
(Pats Xiaoshan on the shoulder and leaves.)

(From that day on, Xiaoshan ran every day along the coastline. But gradually, he found he had reached a limit and could no longer push past it. By now, Xiaoshan had been training at the school for two years.) Maybe I should go home to see my family and Xiaomei, and get myself back on track.
Xiaoshan, you finally made it back before dawn!! By the way, where's Xiaomei?
Xiaomei? I haven't gone to see her yet. Isn't she waiting for me at home?
What? Xiaomei said a lot has changed in the village over the past two years. Worried you'd lose your way, she went to pick you up!
I didn't run into her, we must have missed each other. I need to find her!
(Grabbing her son) But Xiaoshan, the sun is about to rise. It's too dangerous to go out now. Maybe Xiaomei couldn’t find you and went back home to wait.

content.content: No, if Xiaomei can't find me now, she'll definitely stay out there worrying about me. I have to go look for her. You all wait at home, and if Xiaomei comes back, you can fire a flare to let me know.

The sun is up, and I'm hungry. Mom, make me something to eat. Dad, don't just stand there, get my room in order. I've been tired these past days, you guys take good care of me, and I won't wander around anymore.
It's dangerous outside, but if something happens to Xiaomei, her dad will surely have my head. It'd be even more dangerous then! I have to go, otherwise, her dad might kill me.
Mom, I know you're worried about me. Okay, I'll wait until it gets dark before looking for Xiaomei. She's clever, I'm sure she'll be fine.

question: #question#What should Xiaoshan say to show he has a voice in front of his family and can express his thoughts firmly?

content.content: (Mom doesn't know about his affection for Xiaomei but understands her concern for him.) Alright. Xiaomei is so smart, she'll definitely find a place to hide if she sees the sun has risen.
Mom, I understand you're worried about me, but the sun is dangerous for both me and Xiaomei. I have to find her.
Mom, I understand your worries as a mother, but think about Xiaomei's mother too. She'd be worried about her daughter. I have to find her because I understand the feelings of mothers.
Mom, I understand your concerns as a mother, but consider Xiaomei's mother who would also worry about her daughter. I must find Xiaomei because I understand how you both feel as mothers.

question: #question#What should Xiaoshan do to show he understands his mother's feelings and doesn't want her to worry about him anymore?

dialog.content: (Worried about her son, but knowing she can't go against him. Besides, she is really worried about Xiaomei) Okay, Xiaomei headed east. Follow this direction. Be quick. If the sun really rises, make sure you get back immediately!

Mm hmm. (Suppressing his fear of sunlight, Little Shan runs quickly. However, the sun gradually escapes the horizon's cover, casting light and heat upon him, and every corner of this land, representing the temperature of death. So, Little Shan hastens his pace and continues to run.) Xiaomei!!!! Where are you!!!
(Weakly) I... I'm here...

(Finally, in the ditch by the roadside, Little Shan finds Xiaomei. She is lying there, with symptoms of dissolution already showing on her body. So, Little Shan holds Xiaomei in his arms to shield her from direct sunlight, and runs quickly towards home.) Mom, we're back.
(Quickly taking over Xiaomei to heal her, suddenly sees Little Shan collapsing to the ground) Little Shan, what's wrong with you?

(Feeling weak in all limbs, the voices of the family around him gradually fade. Someone says, Little Shan might not make it, no Ice Person can survive in sunlight for so long. There is crying all around. But Little Shan regains his strength) Mom... how is Xiaomei?
(Surprised and happy) Little Shan, you're awake!!! Wonderful!!!! Xiaomei is fine. Luckily, you're okay too!!!! Let Mom take a look at the wound on your back.
(Letting the family turn him around, expecting his back to be a horrifying sight.)
(Astonished) Little Shan, you?! Why aren't you hurt?

(That night, Little Shan went to the hospital for a check-up. The doctor said Little Shan had contracted a strange disease, which had no impact on his body but allowed him to resist the sun's incursion. So Little Shan hurriedly shared the news with everyone.) I'm actually not afraid of sunlight.
(Amidst everyone's amazement, only the Leader showed a long-lost smile) Little Shan, you are the hope of our Ice People!! You will be the hero of the Ice People!!
Hero? What do you mean?
(Expression changing from joy to solemnity) Over twenty years ago... After destroying hundreds of planets, Earth arrived at our frozen planet. It was the darkest day in history.
What on earth happened? What did Earth people do to us?
On that day, Earth's president threatened us that they have given us two choices. Challenge or destruction.
Challenge or destruction? What do you mean?
It seems to be Earth's usual trick. They use their powerful weapons to force other planets to play an impossible game with them. Once the game fails, they will destroy this planet immediately.
So what was the game that Earth people gave us?

They knew Ice People are good runners, so they demanded an unprecedented marathon: without any assistance, relying purely on the body, running a lap along the coastline of this planet. If any Ice Person could complete this challenge, they promised to leave immediately. And they gave us 100 years. If no Ice Person succeeds in a hundred years, our planet will completely vanish from the universe.
(Angry and more than a little shocked) But, Leader, can we really complete it?

At first, I thought it was impossible, because even if someone could run that far, it would be impossible to do it all in one night. But you, Little Shan, your body can resist the sun. You are the hope of our Ice People.
(Looking at the Leader's hopeful eyes) I will not let the Leader down.
Good child!

(Ten years have passed in the blink of an eye. In the 300-year average lifespan of Ice People, ten years is neither long nor short. After ten years of training, Little Shan is no longer afraid of sunlight, but gradually became accustomed to the feeling of running under the scorching rays. Little Shan runs through the empty streets under the blazing sun. Little Shan has never set a fixed route but instead lets his feet carry him forward. But the runners are becoming fewer, as Ice People either turn to other methods or give up the challenge altogether. People have gone to distant places, where technology is said to be advanced, and people are trying new technologies. Unconsciously, Little Shan runs back to his hometown. Suddenly, a familiar figure appears in front of him) Xiao...Xiaomei?
Little Shan, long time no see. How have you been?
I'm good, how about you? What have you been up to lately? We haven't met since you were discharged from the hospital.
I’m fine, fully recovered. But... (Xiaomei lowers her head, a bit downcast)
What's wrong?
I was found to have a talent for mechanical manufacturing, so the Leader sent me to work far away. I'm about to leave. Goodbye, Little Shan.

content.content: (Smiling) You've always been the most outstanding person I've known. Go, Xiaomei, shine where you are. You'll definitely achieve something great! And I will achieve my goal too!
(Hugging Xiaomei) Xiaomei, please! You can't leave me! We've been through so much, I can't be without you! No matter what happens, I'm willing to face it with you, please don't go, okay?
(Angry) So what do I mean to you? You're just leaving like this. Haha, it seems I'm nothing in your heart!
Let's elope together, Xiaomei! We're not saints, we just need to live our own lives well, right?
(Smiling) Is mechanical manufacturing suitable for girls, especially given your health? Won’t you be too tired? How could the Leader send you so far away, you'll be very happy, right!
(Smiling) But isn't staying in the village pretty nice? Why go so far away? Don't go, stay for my sake.
(Smiling, somewhat lost) Alright, Xiaomei, you go then. So you're really leaving me, huh? Goodbye! You'll definitely regret it! I will achieve my goal!

question: #question# What can Little Shan do to make Xiaomei happier about her chosen path?

content.content: (Thinking of his original dream, he no longer wants to be apart from Xiaomei, and doesn't want her to be alone) I'll go with you!

Xiaomei, I've just realized, I've been off track before. Why didn’t you tell me sooner that you had a talent for mechanical manufacturing, that's amazing! I want to learn it too, I've decided to become a great engineer!
I realized, I don’t actually want to save the frozen planet, what I really want is to teach and educate people. So, Xiaomei, can you not leave, can you stay for me?
Xiaomei, I've suddenly realized my previous goal was actually manipulated by the Leader. I’ve decided I need to change my goal, to become the Leader this life and gain power.

question: #question# How can Little Shan prove he has recognized his true life goal?

dialog.content: Thank you, Xiaoshan. Take care.

(Opens his mouth to say something, but remembering his mission, he only says) Take care. (Years later, Xiaoshan is still running day after day, with amazing speed and endurance, but he's reached the limit of the Ice People. Xiaoshan starts to doubt the success of the whole affair. He's the best runner on the planet, and for decades he's run with tirelessly consistency, yet still can't complete the Earthling's challenge. Now, with the hundred-year agreement looming, he wonders if he can truly save the Ice People. So, Xiaoshan goes to the leader, only to unexpectedly find Xiaomei there too.) Xiaomei, what are you doing here too? It's been nearly seventy years since we last met.
(With a knowing smile) Xiaoshan, long time no see!

(With a solemn and serious expression) This is the moment of truth, Xiaoshan, come with us. (The leader and Xiaomei lead Xiaoshan to tour the project they've been working on for the past 70 years. In the desolate parts of the planet, towering chimney-like structures stand densely on the ice.)
(Deeply shocked by the scene) What is this? What does it mean?
We're about to ignite these engines, the immense thrust will move the planet towards the sun.
Towards the sun? Is it to escape Earth? But the Ice People can't withstand high temperatures.

No, have you forgotten? We chose to accept the challenge! (After the Frozen Planet is launched, over the course of a few months, the leader and Xiaomei explain to Xiaoshan another great project they've accomplished, that the Ice People will live underground in the future, where it is eternally night, which is a paradise for the Ice People. Meanwhile, the planet's surface begins to slowly melt, forming a larger ocean, and the coastline is gradually shrinking. Finally, on the day of the hundred-year agreement, Xiaoshan begins his challenge under the scorching sun) Run, Xiaoshan!
Challenge successful, Earth will permanently withdraw from the Frozen Planet.
(in surprise) What? What nonsense are you talking about?

I'm not talking nonsense. Xiaomei, ever since I was a child, I've made countless tough choices for my parents, for the planet, and for the leader's expectations. But the only choice I've ever truly wanted is you.
But Xiaoshan, you have to stay. For the planet.

(suppressing ten years of frustration and anger) But I've been running under the scorching sun for ten years, and it's an impossible challenge. You think so too, right? Who could possibly run around the coastline?
I... I don't know either.
No, you do know! Xiaomei, let's go together; we have 70 years ahead of us to share.
But the leader won't agree to let you leave with me.
Then we'll go to a place where he can't find us, to the ends of the earth, and there will always be a place for us.
(holding Xiaoshan's hand) Okay!
(Relieved) Yes, don't worry, Little Shan.

(However, when the sun set, and Little Shan went to find Little Mei, he received the news that Little Mei had tragically died from sun exposure. It turned out that on her way to meet Little Shan, she accidentally slipped into a ditch and remained unconscious. Her family, thinking she was at Little Shan's house, didn’t go looking for her. Little Shan blamed himself for her death.) Little Mei, it’s all my fault. You died because of me, and how can I face living now?

From then on, Little Shan was engulfed in guilt, refusing to leave his room or return to school for training. He became like Uncle Wang from the village, drinking excessively every day and murmuring Little Mei's name. Many years later, a voice came from the sky: 'Time is up, Frozen Planet Challenge failed.' Suddenly, everything around became scorching hot, and Little Shan, along with the frozen planet, vanished completely into the universe.
(Looking gratefully at Xiǎoshǎn) Mm-hmm! Let's run together!

(Every evening, Xiǎoshǎn runs with Xiaomei, and they head home for breakfast and sleep at sunrise. Life is mundane and even boring. One day while running, you suddenly ask) Xiaomei, why do we run night after night like this?
(Looks up at the Earth's sky, then looks down again) I don't know...
Do you think it has something to do with Earth's arrival?
That's just a guess. Earth only communicated with our planet twenty years ago when it arrived. The adults refuse to tell us what really happened.
They won’t tell us because they're worried we'll do something foolish. If only we could find someone less cautious.
(Suddenly lifting her head) Oh, right! Uncle Wang! He lives in a small ice house at the village's edge and used to be a soldier. He surely knows what happened!
You’re so clever! Let’s go find Uncle Wang right now!

profile.name: Uncle Wang
profile.public profile: Uncle Wang was once a soldier. When Earth arrived, as a soldier, he witnessed firsthand the gamble and since then felt life was meaningless. He drinks all day and was eventually kicked out of the army and returned to his hometown to settle down.
profile.goal: Uncle Wang just wishes to muddle through life in a stupor, never to wake up.

dialog.content: (Red-faced from drinking) I can tell you what you want to know, but... (rubs his fingers together)
(Understanding his intention, hands money to Uncle Wang) Here you go. Can you talk now?
You don't need to worry about why we're running all the time, just know it's all because of humans.
What did the humans do?
They threatened us with force and set an impossible goal for the ice people to achieve, just to torment us for their amusement.
(A trace of anger crossing his heart) What goal did they set?
You don’t need to know, just know we have to run incredibly fast. But it's impossible. This is all just a reality show! In a hundred years, we'll be dead, oh no, eighty years.
What’s a reality show?
I don't know, that's what the humans call it.

(After the two leave Uncle Wang’s home in a daze, they continue their routine runs every day, but Xiaomei runs less frequently. One day, Xiaomei says) I found a blueprint for a spacecraft. Would you like to go to Earth with me?

content.content: Xiaomei, Earth's technology is so advanced, we can’t possibly compete with them. Besides, I’m sure the leader already has more talented people by his side. We promised to keep running together, and if you’re busy building a spacecraft, I won’t be able to reach you.
Xiaomei, let’s analyze the situation seriously, we're no match for the humans. Therefore, I think the most important thing is to enjoy the rest of our lives, and stop doing useless things.

Xiaomei, what's crucial right now is to thoroughly analyze our current situation. Going to Earth is entirely untimely. I am so talented, how can I risk an adventure to Earth? I find the risk too great. My life is precious, it’s not worth risking for this.
Xiaomei, let’s forget it. The map seems fake, and how are we, two kids, supposed to build it? Even if we do, it might not succeed. Let’s not waste time and come up with a more practical plan.

question: #question# What should Xiǎoshǎn say to show he has made a reasonable, detailed consideration at this stage?

content.content: I’m willing!! I’ll help you build it so we can finish quickly and get our revenge on those human bastards.

Of course, I’m willing to make the spacecraft with you. But, can a girl like you manage? Maybe I should do it, and you can help with some assistant work. I’m worried the work might be too heavy and you might get hurt.

Xiaomei, we work so well together, there's no problem we can't solve. But are you suggesting this because you don’t want to run anymore? Don’t be afraid of running, I’ll help you! There are really many skills you can learn to ensure we’ll get better and better at it! But you can’t use it as an excuse.
Xiaomei, I’m totally up for it. But Earth is so dangerous, we need a plan and shouldn’t act rashly. I think we should first report it to the leader.

question: #question# What should Xiǎoshǎn do to show his willingness to collaborate with Xiaomei to achieve their shared goal?

dialog.content: (Looking at Xiaomei with disappointment) No, even if I'm alone, I will build an aircraft and fight against the Earthlings till the end!
(Thinking about the power of Earth, and recalling his mother's worries for him, he ultimately remains silent.)
(Eight years later, Xiaomei finally built the first aircraft) Xiaoshan, do you want to watch my test flight!
(Over the past eight years, he ran daily routines and rarely saw Xiaomei, always feeling something was missing) Xiaomei, you're amazing. I want to watch your test flight.
(Entering the cockpit, the aircraft slowly ascends) Xiaoshan, I did it!! I'm going to Earth right now!
(A flash of panic crosses his face) No, Xiaomei, it's too dangerous. Come down now!
Wish me luck.

Since then, Xiaoshan never saw Xiaomei again. He often stared at Earth lost in thought, hoping for a miracle to happen, but never received any news about Xiaomei. Thirty years later, when Xiaoshan observed Earth through the most advanced telescope, he saw a giant photo of Xiaomei on Earth's surface. Rubbing his eyes in disbelief, he realized he wasn't mistaken. Sadly, Xiaoshan would never know what happened to Xiaomei. Ultimately, eighty years later, they heard a voice from the sky: 'Time's up, Frozen Planet Challenge failed.' In an instant, the surroundings became scorching, and the frozen planet disappeared completely from the universe.
(Xiaomei, with immense talent, finally created an aircraft. Although it took 5 years, that's not long compared to the 300-year average lifespan of the Ice People) Let's set off!
Yeah, yeah!! Let's go find those scumbags, the humans!

(Piloting the aircraft as it slowly ascends, both are incredibly excited. Looking down, it's their first time seeing the frozen planet from this perspective; it's so beautiful and majestic. The two are determined not to let their planet be destroyed.) Xiaoshan, look quickly, we're getting close to Earth.
(His expression slowly turns serious as he suddenly sees something swiftly coming towards them) Xiaomei, watch out, dodge quickly.
(Maneuvering the aircraft to dodge the laser beams like raindrops, her superb piloting skills allow them to narrowly escape danger.) That was close!

Look! (They find themselves on Earth's surface. The Earth is covered in steel and glass, colder and darker than seen through a telescope! But there’s no sign of humans, just as Xiaomei suspected, humans live beneath this metal layer. They see an entrance and step inside, suddenly a figure appears ahead.) Who are you?

profile.name: Xiao Jia
profile.public profile: Xiao Jia is a human who always appears to be 20 years old. He is one of the staff in the Earth President’s reality show. This year, it's his turn to be stationed on Earth's outer side, closely observing the progress on the frozen planet.
profile.goal: Xiao Jia hopes the frozen planet fails its challenges and eventually shatters.

dialog.content: I am a human. I've detected bombs on you, do not proceed any further!
(This is their first time seeing what humans look like, not at all transparent and quite short, far from their imagined devilish appearance) Why are you doing this to our planet?
(Disdainfully) In our eyes, you're nothing but insects! Do not come any closer, or you'll be blown to pieces.
We have bombs on us, if you don’t let us in, we'll all go down together!
Heh, these bombs of yours would only blow yourselves up, they wouldn't leave a scratch on me.
Damn it!

Now you have two choices: first, your little resistance has piqued our interest, you can live on Earth and entertain humans. Second, you continue to resist, and the only thing waiting for you is death.
(Hearing the humans' arrogant speech, she's filled with uncontrollable anger, exchanges a glance with Xiaoshan.) Xiaoshan, let's take them down!

content.content: Great!! Xiaomei, let’s take them down, we’ll never surrender to the human devils!
Xiaomei, whatever you say goes, but don't you think this decision is too hasty? We need a long-term plan.
The humans are too hateful, Xiaomei, follow my lead! Let’s fight this villain today!!!!
Xiaomei, I’ll listen to you, but now isn’t the time to be rash. Don’t get angry, we don’t need to fuss over every little thing with the humans! How about we be magnanimous and forgive them!

question: #question#How should Xiaoshan express that he's willing to follow Xiaomei's orders?

content.content: Xiaomei, no!! There must be a better way. Let's first explore inside Earth, maybe we can plead for the Earthlings’ mercy!

Xiaomei, don’t do that! Even though things look bad now, once you hit rock bottom, there’s nowhere to go but up. Let’s retreat for now, as long as the green hills remain, there’ll always be firewood to burn.

Xiaomei, don’t get angry, things aren’t as bad as they seem. Let’s head inside Earth first and see what’s going on. With our charm, maybe we’ll become superstars there! Don’t you want to be a star and enjoy being in the limelight?

question: #question#How can Xiaoshan show he's optimistic about the current situation?

dialog.content: (Looking at the two rushing towards him, slightly astonished.) As expected, struggling insects are the most interesting. It's truly a pity, but the game ends here.
Xiao Mei, in our next life, we'll be together again, right?
We definitely will.

The two exchanged a smile, holding hands, and simultaneously detonated the bomb, scattering shattered ice crystals everywhere. The protective shield could prevent humans from any bomb shockwave harm, allowing Xiao Jia to exit unscathed. However, as he left, a shard of broken ice fell on his face, making Xiao Jia feel a long-lost chill.
No, don't be naive, Xiaoshan. They're demons, they'll never have any mercy! (With that, she charged at Xiao Jia and detonated the bomb)
(Xiao Jia didn't move an inch, yet Xiaomei's bomb didn't harm him at all. He looked at the scattered ice crystals on the ground) Haha, foolish insect. (Turning to Xiaoshan) Now, it's your turn.
(Knowing his struggle is futile, he can only temporarily hide his hostility) I... I'm willing to go to Earth with you.
(With a contemptuous smile) Welcome to the human world, you'll fall in love with life on Earth.

Xiaoshan originally intended to find a way to save his homeland once he arrived on Earth, but he was immediately held captive and even put on display like an animal. Gradually, Xiaoshan lost hope of returning home. He also uncovered humanity's 'reality show secret.' It turns out, humans gave the Ice People 100 years to train someone to run a lap along the coastline. According to human technology predictions, Xiaoshan had the strongest potential for running, which is why they imprisoned him. Xiaoshan ultimately had to witness his frozen planet being blown to countless pieces, leading him to die in depression.
(With a mocking smile on his lips) You truly underestimate the power of Earth. Fire!

In an instant, the Earth's outer surface launched a massive barrage of thermonuclear missiles. Meanwhile, the Frozen Planet was still trapped in the era of cold weapons, no match for Earth's might. The entire planet evaporated in an instant, disappearing without a trace as Earth slowly advanced toward its next unfortunate target.
